name: opelstrbas

⊢ (w0 → c0 =(Base ` c1))

⊣ (w0 → Fun(`' `' c1))
⊣ (w0 → <(Base ` ndx), c0 > ∈ c1)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
